title: Add paragraph-level list formatting support
description: Enhance update_paragraph_style to support creating bulleted/numbered lists with nested indentation levels for existing text. This enables agents to create well-structured documents that match professional document styles.
close_reason: Successfully implemented paragraph-level list formatting support. Enhanced update_paragraph_style tool to support creating bulleted/numbered lists with nested indentation levels (0-8). Updated helper function create_bullet_list_request to accept nesting_level parameter. Updated documentation in README.md, docs/README.md, and docs/README_NEW.md.

title: Implement CLI mode for Workspace MCP
description:
Create a CLI mode for the Workspace MCP server, activated via --cli flag, that allows all tools to be used directly from the command line without running as an MCP server.

**Goals:**
- Add --cli startup flag to enable CLI mode
- Expose all existing tools as CLI subcommands
- No changes to individual tool implementations - reuse existing code
- Lightweight and flexible design
- Enable usage by coding agents (Codex, Claude Code) without MCP server overhead

**Requirements:**
- Parse tool name and arguments from command line
- Route to existing tool handlers
- Output results to stdout (JSON or human-readable)
- Maintain same authentication/credential flow
- Support all current tools without modification
